amendment.description: To reauthorize the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3983 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3983 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR 10/7/2004 S10612) To reauthorize the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3983 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3983 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
